mapper.select: SELECT PR.RESNUM as RESNUM ,PR.RESTITLE as RESTITLE ,PR.USERID as USERID ,PR.USERNAME as USERNAME ,PR.UCONTENT as UCONTENT ,PR.REG_DATE as REG_DATE ,PR.PICTURE as PICTURE ,PR.EDU_CODE as EDU_CODE ,PR.EDU_CONTENT as EDU_CONTENT ,PR.LICENSE as LICENSE ,PR.CAREER_CODE as CAREER_CODE ,PR.CAREER_CONTENT as CAREER_CONTENT ,PR.SKILL as SKILL ,PR.SIDO_CODE as SIDO_CODE ,PR.GUGUN_CODE as GUGUN_CODE FROM PERSONAL_RESUME PR , APPLIED_RESUME AP , RECRUIT RC WHERE PR.RESNUM = AP.RESNUM AND AP.RECNUM = RC.RECNUM AND RC.COMID=#{comid}

SELECT RESNUM ,RESTITLE ,USERID ,USERNAME ,UCONTENT ,REG_DATE ,PICTURE ,EDU_CODE ,EDU_CONTENT ,LICENSE ,CAREER_CODE ,CAREER_CONTENT ,SKILL ,SIDO_CODE ,GUGUN_CODE FROM PERSONAL_RESUME WHERE RESNUM=#{resnum}
SELECT PM.USERNAME USERNAME ,BIRTH ,UPHONE ,UADDR ,EMAIL FROM PERSONAL_MEMBERS PM LEFT JOIN PERSONAL_RESUME PR ON PM.USERID = PR.USERID WHERE PR.RESNUM = #{resnum}
